name: Crypto Perx
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: The Crypto Banking Alliance based in Zug, Switzerland is the issuer of the Crypto Perx (CPRX) token. The 1st universal independent crypto rewards token.
